# Express + Typescript + Typeorm

[![Typeorm Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/TypeOrm-orange?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/png;base64,&Color=white&link=https://typeorm.io/#/)](https://typeorm.io/#/)

[![Typescript](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Typescript-blue.svg?logo=typescript&style=flat-square)](https://www.typescriptlang.org)


This is a structure project for a based backend application.

## :rocket: Features

- Typescript
- TypeOrm
- Express
- Tests
- Middleware for JWT authentication
- Absolute paths
- Configured Jest
- Configured Babel

# :fix:
